channel.title: Config on Hugo Relearn Theme
channel.description: Recent content in Config on Hugo Relearn Theme

item.title: Configuration
item.description: On top of Hugo’s global configuration options, the Relearn theme lets you define further options unique to the theme in your hugo.toml. The defaults are written in the comments of each option. Note that some of these options are explained in detail in other sections of this documentation. ​ hugo.toml [params] # If an option value is said to be not set, you can achieve the same behavior # by given it an empty string value.
